description: Aryel Sanat (Miguel Angel Sanabria) has been interested in Theosophy since his teens and has lectured and written on J. Krishnamurti since 1964. Having received a bachelors degree in humanities from the Instituto de la Habana at the age of 16, Sanat also attended the University of Miami, and received a B.A. in philosophy there as well. He has presented several lectures and papers on various Theosophical topics.
name: Aryel Sanat
